name: Toxic Waste
uniques: Nullifies all other stats this tile provides
Every [9] tiles with this terrain will receive a major deposit of a strategic resource.
Units ending their turn on this terrain take [10] damage

name: Pre-war Antenna
uniques: Every [9] tiles with this terrain will receive a major deposit of a strategic resource.

civilopediaText.text: This coastal area seems to be relatively untouched by the course of the events nor by toxic currents, resulting in a paradise for sea fauna and flora.
